https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7ar0LEUyX6rRrYEsg5uQrXKBDUX.jpg Three friends form a gang of pirates, “Sea Burglars”, get assigned to a mission against the Mob, after a large cargo of diamonds was heisted. Things turn into a web of rivalries and paybacks, when one one of them decides to do the mission on his own and escape to Morocco. Casablanca
